name: OPUS: Collector's Edition
summary:
OPUS: Collector's Edition includes:

- OPUS: The Day We Found Earth - The Game
- OPUS: The Day We Found Earth - Original Soundtrack
- OPUS: Rocket of Whispers - The Game
- OPUS: Rocket of Whispers - Original Soundtrack
- OPUS: Rocket of Whispers - Official Artbook with Bonus World Map
- OPUS: Echo of Starsong - Full Bloom Edition
- OPUS: Echo of Starsong - Official Artbook
- OPUS: Echo of Starsong - Official Game Script Vol.1
- OPUS: Echo of Starsong - Official Game Script Vol.2
- OPUS: Echo of Starsong - Complete Soundtrack Vol.1
- OPUS: Echo of Starsong - Complete Soundtrack Vol.2
